abstract: Op-Ed article by former Justice Dept counsel Jennifer Daskal rejects Pres Obama's authority to continue military operations in Middle East under 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force, which was passed in wake of Sept 11 attacks and does not apply to current conflicts; urges Obama to create new authorization for wars in Iraq, Syria, Afghanistan, Pakistan and Libya, despite political obstacles.
